info.title: ADHybridHealthService
info.description: REST APIs for Azure Active Directory Connect Health

get.description: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Service, for a tenant, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The service property filter to apply.

parameters.name: serviceType
parameters.description: The service type for the services onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health. Depending on whether the service is monitoring, ADFS, Sync or ADDS roles, the service type can either be AdFederationService or AadSyncService or AdDomainService.

parameters.name: skipCount
parameters.description: The skip count, which specifies the number of elements that can be bypassed from a sequence and then return the remaining elements.

parameters.name: takeCount
parameters.description: The take count , which specifies the number of elements that can be returned from a sequence.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of Active Directory Domain Controller services.

post.description: Onboards a service for a given tenant in Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: Adds the Active Directory Domain Controller Services.

get.description: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Services for a tenant having Azure AD Premium license and is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The service property filter to apply.

parameters.name: serviceType
parameters.description: The service type for the services onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health. Depending on whether the service is monitoring, ADFS, Sync or ADDS roles, the service type can either be AdFederationService or AadSyncService or AdDomainService.

parameters.name: skipCount
parameters.description: The skip count, which specifies the number of elements that can be bypassed from a sequence and then return the remaining elements.

parameters.name: takeCount
parameters.description: The take count , which specifies the number of elements that can be returned from a sequence.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of premium services.

get.description: Gets the details of an Active Directory Domain Service for a tenant having Azure AD Premium license and is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The Active Directory Domain Controller service as specified by the serviceName property.

delete.description: Deletes an Active Directory Domain Service which is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service which needs to be deleted.

parameters.name: confirm
parameters.description: Indicates if the service will be permanently deleted or disabled. True indicates that the service will be permanently deleted and False indicates that the service will be marked disabled and then deleted after 30 days, if it is not re-registered.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

patch.description: Updates an Active Directory Domain Service properties of an onboarded service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service which needs to be deleted.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: Successfully updated service.

get.description: Gets the details of the servers, for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The server property filter to apply.

parameters.name: isGroupbySite
parameters.description: Indicates if the result should be grouped by site or not.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The custom query.

parameters.name: nextPartitionKey
parameters.description: The next partition key to query for.

parameters.name: nextRowKey
parameters.description: The next row key to query for.

parameters.name: takeCount
parameters.description: The take count , which specifies the number of elements that can be returned from a sequence.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of Active Directory Domain Servers.

get.description: Gets the details of the Active Directory Domain servers, for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The server property filter to apply.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of Active Directory Domain Servers.

get.description: Gets the alerts for a given Active Directory Domain Service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The alert property filter to apply.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The alert state to query for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date to query for.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date till when to query for.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of alerts for the given service.

get.description: Gets the service configurations.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: grouping
parameters.description: The grouping for configurations.

200.description: The Active Directory Domain Controller service configuration.

get.description: Gets the dimensions for a given dimension type in a server.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The dimension type.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of dimensions for a server.

get.description: Gets the user preferences for a given feature.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: The name of the feature.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: The name of the feature.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

delete.description: Deletes the user preferences for a given feature.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: The name of the feature.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: Successfully deleted the user preference settings.

parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of forest summary for the service.

get.description: Gets complete domain controller list along with replication details for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The server property filter to apply.

parameters.name: withDetails
parameters.description: Indicates if InboundReplicationNeighbor details are required or not.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of replication details for a service.

get.description: Gets Replication status for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The replication status for a service.

get.description: Gets complete domain controller list along with replication details for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: $filter

parameters.name: isGroupbySite

get.description: Gets the details of the servers, for a given Active Directory Domain Controller service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health Service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The server property filter to apply.

parameters.name: dimensionType
parameters.description: The server specific dimension.

parameters.name: dimensionSignature
parameters.description: The value of the dimension.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of service members for a given service.

post.description: Onboards  a server, for a given Active Directory Domain Controller service, to Azure Active Directory Connect Health Service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service under which the server is to be onboarded.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: Successfully added the service member.

get.description: Gets the details of a server, for a given Active Directory Domain Controller service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health Service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: serviceMemberId
parameters.description: The server Id.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The service member details for a given service.

delete.description: Deletes a Active Directory Domain Controller server that has been onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health Service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: serviceMemberId
parameters.description: The server Id.

parameters.name: confirm
parameters.description: Indicates if the server will be permanently deleted or disabled. True indicates that the server will be permanently deleted and False indicates that the server will be marked disabled and then deleted after 30 days, if it is not re-registered.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: Successfully deleted the service member.

get.description: Gets the details of an alert for a given Active Directory Domain Controller service and server combination.

parameters.name: serviceMemberId
parameters.description: The server Id for which the alert details needs to be queried.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The alert property filter to apply.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The alert state to query for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date to query for.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date till when to query for.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

200.description: The list of server alerts.

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

patch.description: Updates tenant properties for tenants onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

requestBody.description: The tenant object with the properties set to the updated value.

200.description: Successfully updated the tenant.

get.description: Lists the available Azure Data Factory API operations.
